chapter.title: Maintenance
chapter.para: Be friendly to your printer when you speak to it.
If the green led is blinking, please add paper using the following procedure.

procedure.title: Inserting paper into printer
procedure.para: This procedure is for printer owners. If you don't have a printer, consider buying one.

step.para: Make sure that you have paper.
Insert paper into printer. If you don't have paper, consult
